text: Khumbula ngenkathi ekukhombisa bona uMvelinqangi ephuphweni lakho bembalwa futhi ukube wakukhombisa bona bebaningi ngempela (nina abakholwayo) nanizolahlekelwa ugqozi futhi ngempela nanizophikisana odabeni (ukuthi niye empini noma ningayi) kepha uMvelinqangi wanisindisa ngempela yena uyisazi salokho okusezifubeni
